item.title: Saudi dissident awarded $4.1 million by UK court for hacking, assault 'by Saudi Arabia' - Reuters
item.description: Saudi dissident awarded $4.1 million by UK court for hacking, assault ‘by Saudi Arabia’ ReutersSaudi Arabia ordered to pay £3m to London dissident over Pegasus spying The GuardianSaudi Activist Awarded £3 Million by UK Court Over Hacking, Assault Bloomberg.comSaudi Arabia ordered to pay YouTuber £3m for Harrods beating and phone hack The IndependentJudge awards British critic of Saudis $4.1 million, finds the regime hacked his devices The…
